name: Quad 3
description:
Quad 3 is a supplement for [BXLLET> by Rathayibacter  (https://rathayibacter.itch.io/bxllet), and the third entry in the Quad series , supplements for [BXLLET>

Four classes are included:

  • Revolutionary, a fighter for the people.
  • Swxrd, a relic of the long lost past.
  • Wrestler Mech, fistfight Humans and Beasts, in a mech or out.
  • Mutxnt, someone who is going through a metamorphosis.
